column2: dt.calculate(dt.name = "dat", the.variables = c("Sepal.Length"), the.functions = c("mean", "sd"), the.filter = "Sepal.Length < 0.9 * Max_Sepal_Length_Species", grouping.variables = "Species", table.format = "wide", return.as = "all")
"dat[Sepal.Length < 0.9 * Max_Sepal_Length_Species, .(Sepal.Length_mean = mean(Sepal.Length), Sepal.Length_sd = sd(Sepal.Length)), keyby = Species]"
